attributes.action: consider the heavy  tax burdens on people who have to use cars to take children regularly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think this is an ill thought out plan
which erodes the privacy of people. even
in U.S.A they dont permit taking of photos for speeding because it is an intrusion of privacy.Please do not bring this way of controling here in U.K.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
